summary: A wanted gangster is both king and prisoner of the Casbah. He is protected from arrest by his friends, but is torn by his desire for freedom outside. A visiting Parisian beauty may just tempt his fate.
cast: Jean Gabin|Gabriel Gabrio|Saturnin Fabre|Fernand Charpin|Lucas Gridoux|Gilbert Gil|Marcel Dalio|Charles Granval|Gaston Modot|René Bergeron|Paul Escoffier|Roger Legris|Jean Témerson|Robert Ozanne|Philippe Richard|Georges Péclet|Mireille Balin|Line Noro|Fréhel|Olga Lord|Renée Carl|Franck Maurice|Yacef Saadi
title: Pépé le Moko
